page.title: 05Little Addington Church.
page.content: The church was built in the 13th century. One of the porches has a room above the entrance. The porch is made of stone and the roof is tiled. On the north side of the church there are 4 windows,two are stained glass. On the east side there are 6, one is stained glass. On the south side there are 8 windows of which one is stained glass. There are three doors of which 2 have porches. The north door is the main door,the west door is used by people in wheel-chairs.The south door is used for storing gas cylinders used for heating. There is a porch here. At the top of the church spire is a weather cock. If there are too many graves they will begin to bury people in the 9 allotments.Behind the church is a pine tree; on the west side a row of evergreens and 3 beech trees. The church has a choir,organist,3 bells.
